code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with chronic Kidney. patient is a 30 year old white male beauty therapist. o:Height 69 in, Weight 168 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 10 mL/kg per dose, and ordered CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel.

s:a 31 yr old male beauty therapist presents with 2 years history of Kidney. he consumes 2 drinks per night he denies smoking o:Height 70 in, Weight 170 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 10 mL/kg per dose, and ordered CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel.
